sledgehammer.lua.core.send

Class SendLua

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
        • sledgehammer.lua.LuaTable
          • sledgehammer.lua.Send
            • sledgehammer.lua.core.send.SendLua

  • public class SendLua
extends Send
    Send designed to handle and format Lua to send to the Client-side Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean debugLua
      If set to true, the lua code will be packaged line by line with preservation, so that the code can be debugged.

      • Fields inherited from class sledgehammer.lua.LuaTable

        COPY_OVERWRITE, COPY_UNDERWRITE

      • Fields inherited from class sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject

    • Field Detail

      • debugLua

        public static boolean debugLua
        If set to true, the lua code will be packaged line by line with preservation, so that the code can be debugged.

      • onExport

        public void onExport()
        Overrides:
        onExport in class LuaTable

      • setLuaFiles

        public void setLuaFiles(java.io.File... luaFiles)
        Sets the raw Lua String to only the Files given here.

        (Note: This does not append. To append, use appendLuaFile(files);)

        Parameters:
        luaFiles - The Lua Files to digest.

      • appendLuaFiles

        public void appendLuaFiles(java.io.File... luaFiles)
        Appends LuaFiles by digesting them into a raw, compressed String format.
        Parameters:
        luaFiles - The Lua Files to digest.

      • append

        public void append(SendLua other)
        Appends a SendLua's compiled LuaString to the SendLua instance.
        Parameters:
        other - The other SendLua to append.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the SendLua Object to have no Lua code.

      • send

        public void send()
        Sends the Lua code to the Player set.

      • getLuaString

        public java.lang.String getLuaString()
        Returns:
        Returns the raw Lua String of the LuaSend Object.

      • setLuaString

        public void setLuaString(java.lang.String luaString)
        Sets the raw Lua String of the LuaSend Object.
        Parameters:
        luaString - The String to set.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Returns:
        Returns the Player Object set to pass and reference when building Lua Strings. (Note: This is optional, and null can be returned. Make sure to set null checks)

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(Player player)
        Sets a Player Object to pass and reference when building Lua Strings. (Optional).
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to set.

      • packageLuaFiles

        public static java.lang.String packageLuaFiles(java.io.File... files)
        Packages Lua files into compressed strings without comments or spaces.

        (Note: If 'SendLua.debugLua' is set to true, lines will be preserved)

        Parameters:
        files - The Array of Files to digest.
        Returns:
        Returns the String equivalent of the Lua Files.
